price: Ou os que fazem as más obras supõem que se esquivarão de Nós? Que vil o que julgam!
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-sayiāti an yasbiqūnā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
